test-set.name: fn-ends-with

test-case.name: fn-ends-with2args-1
test-case.description: Evaluates The "ends-with" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:string(lower bound) $arg2 = xs:string(lower bound)
test-case.test: fn:ends-with(xs:string("This is a characte"),xs:string("This is a characte"))

test-case.name: fn-ends-with2args-2
test-case.description: Evaluates The "ends-with" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:string(mid range) $arg2 = xs:string(lower bound)
test-case.test: fn:ends-with(xs:string("This is a characte"),xs:string("This is a characte"))

test-case.name: fn-ends-with2args-3
test-case.description: Evaluates The "ends-with" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:string(upper bound) $arg2 = xs:string(lower bound)
test-case.test: fn:ends-with(xs:string("This is a characte"),xs:string("This is a characte"))

test-case.name: fn-ends-with2args-4
test-case.description: Evaluates The "ends-with" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:string(lower bound) $arg2 = xs:string(mid range)
test-case.test: fn:ends-with(xs:string("This is a characte"),xs:string("This is a characte"))

test-case.name: fn-ends-with2args-5
test-case.description: Evaluates The "ends-with" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:string(lower bound) $arg2 = xs:string(upper bound)
test-case.test: fn:ends-with(xs:string("This is a characte"),xs:string("This is a characte"))

test-case.name: fn-ends-with-1
test-case.description: Evaluates The "ends-with" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "" $arg2 = ""

test-case.name: fn-ends-with-2
test-case.description: Evaluates The "ends-with" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "" $arg2 = "A Character String"

test-case.name: fn-ends-with-3
test-case.description: Evaluates The "ends-with" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "" $arg2 = "A Character String"

test-case.name: fn-ends-with-4
test-case.description: Evaluates The "ends-with" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = () $arg2 = ""

test-case.name: fn-ends-with-5
test-case.description: Evaluates The "ends-with" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "" $arg2 = ()

test-case.name: fn-ends-with-6
test-case.description: Evaluates The "ends-with" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "A Character String" $arg2 = ()

test-case.name: fn-ends-with-7
test-case.description: Evaluates The "ends-with" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = () $arg2 = "A Character String"

test-case.name: fn-ends-with-8
test-case.description: Evaluates The "ends-with" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "AAAAABBBBBCCCCC" $arg2 = "BBBBB"

test-case.name: fn-ends-with-9
test-case.description: Evaluates The "ends-with" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "AAAAABBBBB" $arg2 = " "

test-case.name: fn-ends-with-10
test-case.description: Evaluates The "ends-with" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = " " $arg2 = " AAAAABBBBB"

test-case.name: fn-ends-with-11
test-case.description: Evaluates The "ends-with" function using it as a argument of a fn:not - returns false

test-case.name: fn-ends-with-12
test-case.description: Evaluates The "ends-with" function using it as a argument of a fn:not - returns true

test-case.name: fn-ends-with-13
test-case.description: Evaluates The "ends-with" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:string("A") $arg2 = "A"

test-case.name: fn-ends-with-14
test-case.description: Evaluates The "ends-with" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "A" $arg2 = xs:string("A")

test-case.name: fn-ends-with-15
test-case.description: Evaluates The "ends-with" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "A" $arg2 = "a"

test-case.name: fn-ends-with-16
test-case.description: Evaluates The "ends-with" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "a" $arg2 = "A"

test-case.description: Use ends-with() with a UCA collation

test-case.description: Use ends-with() with a UCA collation

test-case.description: Use ends-with() with a UCA collation and primary matching

test-case.description: Use ends-with() with a UCA collation and primary matching

test-case.name: K-EndsWithFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `ends-with()`.

test-case.name: K-EndsWithFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `ends-with(())`.

test-case.name: K-EndsWithFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `ends-with((), (), "http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/collation/codepoint", "wrong param")`.

test-case.name: K-EndsWithFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `ends-with("a string", "a string", "http://www.example.com/COLLATION/NOT/SUPPORTED")`.

test-case.name: K-EndsWithFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `ends-with("foo", "foo", "http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/collation/codepoint")`.

test-case.name: K-EndsWithFunc-6
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `ends-with("tattoo", "tattoo")`.

test-case.name: K-EndsWithFunc-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(ends-with("tattoo", "atto"))`.

test-case.name: K-EndsWithFunc-8
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(ends-with("tattoo", "atto"))`.

test-case.name: K-EndsWithFunc-9
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `ends-with((), ())`.

test-case.name: K-EndsWithFunc-10
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(ends-with ((), "a string"))`.

test-case.name: K2-EndsWithFunc-1
test-case.description: Compare two values returned from fn:lower-case().

test-case.name: K2-EndsWithFunc-2
test-case.description: Compare two values returned from fn:upper-case().

test-case.name: K2-EndsWithFunc-3
test-case.description: Compare two non-matching values returned from fn:lower-case().

test-case.name: K2-EndsWithFunc-4
test-case.description: Compare two non-matching values returned from fn:upper-case().

test-case.name: K2-EndsWithFunc-5
test-case.description: Compare two non-matching values returned from fn:lower-case() and fn:upper-case().

test-case.name: K2-EndsWithFunc-6
test-case.description: Compare two non-matching values returned from fn:lower-case() and fn:upper-case().

test-case.name: cbcl-ends-with-001
test-case.description: test fn:ends-with with collation and empty string
